input_text: During routine maintenance inspection, I noticed oil dripping from the gearbox area. The leak appears to be coming from the seal area and there seems to be some damage to the seal ring. This could be due to poor assembly quality or the seal ring being defective from the start.

expected_output.effect: Reduce the life of worm gear transmission
expected_output.cause: Seal ring damage or unqualified assembly

input_text: The motor is running extremely hot, much hotter than normal operating temperature. I suspect there might be bearing damage or the cooling fan has failed. If this continues, the motor will likely be damaged permanently.

expected_output.cause: Bearing damage or motor fan damage

input_text: The gas turbine starter is not functioning properly - when I try to start the engine it fails to turn over. The starter seems to have low efficiency and isn't providing enough power to get the engine going.

expected_output.failure_mode: Function failure when not turning the engine on starting

input_text: There's noticeable wear on the piston of the pusher assembly. This appears to be due to inadequate lubrication and general wear over time. The wear is creating clearance and play in the assembly which affects operation.

expected_output.failure_mode: Wear of piston of the pusher assembly
expected_output.effect: Clearance and play in the assembly

input_text: We found that the wire insulation has broken down in the electrical system. This was caused by prolonged exposure to heat and the aging of the insulation material. This breakdown has resulted in a short circuit condition.

The battery system has completely failed. Investigation shows this was due to overcharging the batteries or allowing them to deep discharge repeatedly. As a result, we've lost all power to the system.

The water pump is experiencing cavitation issues. This is happening because we're operating at too high velocity or there's insufficient pressure in the system. The cavitation is causing damage to internal pump components.

expected_output.cause: High velocity operation or low pressure

input_text: We discovered corrosion damage on the pressure vessel. This corrosion was caused by chemical exposure over time. If this continues, it could lead to a leak or even catastrophic burst of the vessel.

Our navigation system is experiencing GPS signal loss. This appears to be due to signal interference from nearby equipment or structures. The signal loss is causing navigation errors and making it difficult to determine our position accurately.

The valve in our system is sticking and not operating smoothly. This sticking appears to be caused by mineral deposits that have built up over time. The valve sticking is reducing the fluid flow through the system.

The power supply unit is overheating significantly. The cause appears to be inadequate ventilation in the equipment cabinet. Due to this overheating, the equipment is shutting down automatically to prevent damage.
The drone's rotor has been damaged after impacting with tree branches during flight. This rotor damage is causing significant flight instability and making the drone difficult to control.

The fuel gauge is displaying erratic readings with swinging and jittery needle movements. This appears to be due to an internal bridge fault in the oil indicator mechanism. This malfunction damages the system's functionality for accurate fuel level monitoring.

expected_output.failure_mode: Swing. Jitter. in the instruction swing

input_text: There's a hydraulic fluid leak coming from the hydraulic cylinder. The leak appears to be caused by a damaged seal ring that's no longer providing proper sealing. This leakage is leading to hydraulic system failure.
I found that the bush on the shaft has come loose. This loosening was caused by excessive vibration during operation. The loose bush is causing loose coupling between components.

The sensor array is providing inaccurate readings that don't match expected values. This inaccuracy is due to calibration drift that has occurred over time. These incorrect readings are providing us with incorrect data for decision making.

The conveyor belt has torn, likely due to overloading or poor maintenance practices. This belt tearing is causing significant disruption in our material handling operations and stopping production flow.

The cylinder arm of the pusher assembly is over-traveling beyond its normal range. This over-travel is due to bad control system settings. As a result, it's creating dents on the bottles being processed.

Our control system experienced a software glitch that caused unexpected behavior. This glitch appears to be due to software aging or bugs that have developed over time. The glitch resulted in a complete system shutdown.

The gas detector sensor has failed and is no longer detecting hazardous gases. This failure was caused by exposure to extreme environmental conditions that exceeded the sensor's specifications. The sensor failure means we've lost our hazard detection capability.
The pump impeller shows significant wear patterns from normal wear and tear over its service life. This impeller wear is reducing the pump's efficiency and affecting its performance.
The rod seals in the pusher assembly have become damaged due to excessive side loading forces. This damage is allowing contaminants to enter the pusher cylinder between the shaft and cylinder walls.

expected_output.effect: Contaminates entering pusher cylinder between shaft and cylinder

input_text: The robot on the assembly line has become misaligned and is no longer positioned correctly. This misalignment is due to wear and tear of the mechanical components over time. The misalignment is causing product defects in our manufacturing process.
The forklift tire is leaking air due to overloading the vehicle beyond its rated capacity. This tire leaking is preventing the forklift from moving properly and making it inoperative.

The fuel valve is dripping fuel due to oversized injection mechanisms that aren't sealing properly. This dripping is causing sticking of piston rings in their grooves and creating fire blow conditions.

expected_output.effect: Sticking of piston rings in their grooves, fire blow
